dmca.title: DMCA NOTICE Re: http://www.bikinibikini.com/forum/thread47819.html
dmca.body:
[mailto:kevin@twistys.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, August 08, 2006 3:47 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: DMCA NOTICE Re:
http://www.bikinibikini.com/forum/thread47819.html
Subject: DMCA NOTICE Re:
http://www.bikinibikini.com/forum/thread47819.html
Importance: High



Dear Legal Correspondent or Designated DMCA Agent:

Our company is the owner of http://www.twistys.com.
<http://www.twistys.com>   This correspondence shall constitute a formal
notice pursuant to 512(c)(3) of the Digital  Millennium Copyright Act,
("DMCA"). Upon investigation, it appears that your company owns or
manages services for <INSERT URL HERE>. This Website contains infringing
images which violate our company's copyright.

The following Web page(s) contain the images that illegally infringe on
our company's copyright:

http://www.bikinibikini.com/forum/thread47819.html  

Demand is hereby made that your company immediately disable/remove this
infringing content pursuant to the requirements of federal law.  If you
fail to promptly disable/remove the infringing content, your company
will be liable as a contributory infringer under the DMCA.

I hereby declare under the penalties of perjury pursuant to 28 U.S.C.
1746, that: 1) I am the copyright owner or have the authority to act on
behalf of the copyright owner; 2) I have a good faith belief that the
above-referenced images infringe on our copyright; and, 3) the factual
representations in this correspondence are true and correct. I also
agree that this transaction is governed by the Electronic Signatures in
Global and National Commerce Act (E-Sign Act), 15 U.S.C. 7000, et seq.,
and adopt the mark below as my electronic signature for purposes of this
correspondence.

Your prompt attention to this matter is appreciated.

Sincerely,

Kevin Cunningham

cc: legal@twistys.com <mailto:legal@twistys.com>
